title: Initial Structure
body:
This commit updates the README and adds some boilerplate
files (code of conduct, contributing guidelines, owners, .gitignore).

title: Introduce types and clients for Metrics APIs
body:
This PR introduces types and clients for both the custom metrics API and the resource metrics API.

The resource metrics API uses autogenerated clients, while the custom metrics API, due the nature of it's URLs, uses a custom client.

title: The custom metrics client should expect a MetricValue instead of a MetricValueList in single-value contexts
Update repo - from kuberntes/kubernetes/staging
body:
The current version doesn't compile with new client-go - some api elements were moved.

cc: @DirectXMan12 @piosz

title: Need a document on how to use this for custom metrics api server
body:
Hi

We are actually planning to implement this custom metrics API server on our cluster and use it for pod auto scaling. So, looking forward to an introductory document or a blog post on how to use this project.

Thanks.

title: Fix typo in Events Code of Conduct
[docs] Add implementation links
body: This PR cleans up the README a bit and adds links to known implementations of the APIs in this repository, as well as a link to the custom-metrics-apiserver boilerplate.

title: Restore README and docs
body:
The README and other associated docs got removed during the initial
resync, when the old branch was renamed to "legacy".  This restores
them from that branch.

title: Remove LICENSE
body:
Addresses https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/54398.

The `README.md` is already present in staging and is not authoritative here.

/cc @sttts

title: fix typo in IMPLEMENTATIONS.md
body: This fixes a misspelling of "convenience" in the IMPLEMENTATIONS.md file.

title: Update code-of-conduct.md
body:
Refer to kubernetes/community as authoritative source for code of conduct

ref: kubernetes/community#1527

title: Create LICENSE
body: This file was missing, but exists in staging/. The bot would have been broken whenever the file is changed in staging/.

title: Make IMPLEMENTATIONS.md and CONTRIBUTING.md authorative in k/k
fix typo
body:
Sorry, we do not accept changes directly against this repository. Please see 
CONTRIBUTING.md for information on where and how to contribute instead.

title: Create a SECURITY_CONTACTS file.
body:
As per the email sent to kubernetes-dev[1], please create a SECURITY_CONTACTS
file.

The template for the file can be found in the kubernetes-template repository[2].
A description for the file is in the steering-committee docs[3], you might need
to search that page for "Security Contacts".

Please feel free to ping me on the PR when you make it, otherwise I will see when
you close this issue. :)

Thanks so much, let me know if you have any questions.

(This issue was generated from a tool, apologies for any weirdness.)

[1] https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/kubernetes-dev/codeiIoQ6QE
[2] https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes-template-project/blob/master/SECURITY_CONTACTS
[3] https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/committee-steering/governance/sig-governance-template-short.md

title: Add FieldSelector member to MetricListOptions
body:
This enables to restrict the list of returned objects by their fields
when using the wildcard filter, similarly to the generic ListOptions.

title: Update embargo doc link in SECURITY_CONTACTS and change PST to PSC
Fix fake clientsets in metrics.k8s.io.
body:
The generated fake clientsets were using the API group "metrics" instead
of "metrics.k8s.io". The `+groupName` annotation needed to be copied to
these packages to fix it.

As a result, tests using this fake clientset work as expected.

Sorry, we do not accept changes directly against this repository. Please see
CONTRIBUTING.md for information on where and how to contribute instead.
